title: New: Ben Khan – Youth
content:
Having taken a few weeks off from the whole ‘blogging scene’, there was realistically only one track to mark my return with.

Ben Khan spent the tail end of last year impressing with his angular, funky R&B infused pop, and is all set to hit the big time in 2014, with the release of his debut EP, 1992. Featuring the previously heard, Savage, Eden and Drive, Pt. 1, new track Youth is even bolder, and potentially more coherent, whilst retaining the choppy, enthralling elements that made his initial offerings so exciting. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
